Title: Relates to requiring prescription drug containers be labeled with a description of the size, shape, color and imprint of the prescription drug it contains
Summary: Requires prescription drug containers be labeled with a description of the size, shape, color and imprint of the prescription drug it contains.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring prescription drug containers be labeled with a description of the size, shape, color and imprint of the prescription drug it contains
